name: Square Nightmare
description: A project developed in 2013 as an entry for the Dr. J. P. Kazickas IT competition for students, held in Kaunas University of Technology. The game was inspired by Minecraft and was aimed to be an alternative, 2D, wave-based survival action game (before Terraria was as notable). I presented the game in the multimedia project competition when I was in the 8th grade, was placed 5th amongst other school-aged students.
